mapper.insert: insert into appointments(student_user_id, teaching_assistant_user_id, group_id, title, content, appointment_type, start_time, end_time) VALUES (#{studentUserId}, #{teachingAssistantUserId}, #{groupId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{appointmentType}, #{startTime.stringValue}, #{endTime.stringValue});
mapper.select: select * from appointments order by start_time;
select * from appointments where student_user_id = #{studentId} order by start_time;
select * from appointments where teaching_assistant_user_id = #{teachingAssistantId} order by start_time;
